page.description: The PDF_APPEND() function appends File_2 to File_1, producing Result_File. If Result_File is blank, then File2 is appended to File1.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = PDF_Append(C File1 ,C File2 [,C Result_File ])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Append was successful. .F. = Append was not successful.

argument.name: File1
argument.description: The name of the file that will be at the beginning of the new combined file.

argument.name: File2
argument.description: The name of the file that will be at the end of the new combined file.

argument.name: Result_File
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The name of the file to create. If Result_File is blank, then File_2 is appended to File_1.
